com.jme3.renderer.opengl

Interface GL4

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GL, GL2, GL3
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GLDebugDesktop, JoglGL, LwjglGL

    public interface GL4
extends GL3
    GL functions only available on vanilla desktop OpenGL 4.0.
